ygData.subject: Re: rune of scale
ygData.msgSnippet: ... One of them, yes. The others are at cazic and at lavastorm. Sure hope I m camping the right spot hehe. ... While trying to do the guk rod all alone I
ygData.messageBody:
Lim Dul wrote:
>
> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> Oh no...I was talking about the rune of scale for the Runescale cloak? I
> understand it was supposed to be carried by saltwater crocs in the back
> regions of Upper Guk?

One of them, yes. The others are at cazic and at lavastorm.

Sure hope I'm camping the right spot hehe.
> But anyway, I think I'll try do the Staff of Wheel over this weekend. I've
> been reading the adventures of people on the Graffe site lately...really
> interesting the different ways people have been doing this quest. =)

While trying to do the guk rod all alone I trained the whole dead side
once or twice. Or three times. :) They did not like that, so make sure
you know where you are going.

The thing that got in the way were the sonic bats who can see through
both invis and invis undead, so you have to stick to a wall carefully
going around their aggro radius. Other than that - if you know the way
and you got see invis and the hand has been recently killed, you can do
it alone.


--
Sergey

Worker bees can leave
Even drones can fly away
The queen is their slave
